property.name: childObjectRecord
property.label: Object Name
property.description: Text, use the API name. E.g. Product2, to Retrieve related record.

property.name: relatedListLabel
property.label: Section Label
property.description: Text, used as table heading. E.g. Release Information.

property.name: column1
property.label: Column 1
property.description: Text, written in array JSON format, use to provide information relevant to fields. E.g. [{"label":"Name","fieldName":"Name","type":"text"}]).

property.name: column2
property.label: Column 2
property.description: Text, written in array JSON format, use to provide information relevant to fields. E.g. [{"label":"Name","fieldName":"Name","type":"text"}]).

property.name: isSubscriber
property.label: Filter
property.description: Set to true to use filters

property.name: contentBlockFilter
property.label: Visibility Filter
property.description: Text, accepts 1 field. Set the reactive field for this section

property.name: readOnlyByParentField
property.label: Controlled Read-Only By Parent Field
property.description: Optional, text, controls the visibility of new and edit button by parent records. E.g. Stage == 'Archived'

property.name: readOnlyByUser
property.label: Controlled Read-Only By User
property.description: Optional, text, controls the visibility of new button by current user details. E.g. Role.Name != 'Advancement Operations Manager'
